title: Fish Tank Salinity Calculator

seo.title: Fish Tank Salinity Calculator | Precise Salt Dose
seo.description: Work out how many grams of marine salt you need to reach your target specific gravity for any aquarium size.

summary: Quickly compute the salt dose you need to hit a target specific gravity in a marine aquarium.
formula: const salt_g = Math.max((target_sg - current_sg) * volume_l * 0.7, 0); return { salt_g };

faq.q: Do I need to recalc after water changes?
faq.a: Yes. Measure the tank again after any water change or top-off before dosing salt.
It is a practical rule of thumb for most marine salts. Always validate with your refractometer.
